summary: An email from JSANYS to USANYS at the U.S. Department of Justice, forwarding an attachment titled 'Epstein_Transcript.pdf' with the message 'Forgot to send this!'. The email is addressed to the Public Affairs office of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: JSANYS
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email forwarding the Epstein transcript attachment.

persons.name: Mia
persons.context: Appears as a recipient at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, likely a staff member in the Press Office.

connections.description: JSANYS is sending an email with an attachment to Mia at the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Email forwarding Epstein transcript
events.description: An email is sent forwarding an attachment titled 'Epstein_Transcript.pdf' to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: An email dated July 11, 2019, forwards an attachment named 'Epstein_Transcript.pdf' to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The sender (JSANYS) states 'Forgot to send this!', indicating the document was previously intended to be shared.
The email is addressed to the Public Affairs/Press Office, suggesting the transcript may have been intended for media or public release.
